meanings.definition: A medical procedure in which a colposcope is used to examine the cervix.
meanings.sent1: During colposcopies, doctors look closely at the cervix with a special tool.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed multiple colposcopies last week to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: At the clinic, they joked that colposcopies are like cervix detectives with magnifying glasses.
meanings.sent4: Her scrutiny of the situation was as thorough as colposcopies examining every detail.
meanings.sent5: The image of colposcopies peering into the cervix stuck in her mind.
